text.div:
Segment_NTE!Annotation_Map (http://hl7.org/fhir/v2-tofhir)

Mapping from https://www.hl7.org/v2 to https://www.hl7.org/fhir

ACTIVE (not intended for production usage). Published on Mar 1, 2020, 12:00:00 AM by HL7 International (HL7 Orders and Observations Workgroup: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/OO/v2-to-FHIR+IG, Keith W. Boone: kboone@ainq.com). Copyright (c) 2020, HL7 International, Inc., All Rights Reserved.

This ConceptMap represents the mapping from the HL7 V2 NTE!Annotation Segment to the FHIR Annotation Resource representing that segment.


Source CodeRelationshipDestination Code
NTE-3is equivalent toAnnotation.text
NTE-5is equivalent toAnnotation.authorReference(Practitioner)
NTE-6is equivalent toAnnotation.time

name: Segment_NTE!Annotation_Map
description: This ConceptMap represents the mapping from the HL7 V2 NTE!Annotation Segment to the FHIR Annotation Resource representing that segment.
